Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Guardian I"', 3: 'Kaw, kaw... kaw, kaw, kaw... Cough, cough...', 4: '1'}
{2: '"Guardian I"', 3: 'Cough, cough... Cough, cough...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A battered Guardian staggers toward Pulao. Its long blade, meant for slashing enemies, has become a walking stick.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A cold light flashes behind Pulao just before the Guardian is pierced through the chest by a spear.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The light in its eyes slowly flickers and fades, until it shuts off completely and the weapon falls from its grip.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'm fine... The mechanoid didn't seem to have ill intentions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "But it's neutralized now nonetheless. Thank you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "We're just finishing off a few small fries from behind.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao picks up the fallen sword that belonged to the Guardian. A cluster of debris from Kowloong mechanoids lay in front of her.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'All these Kowloong mechanoids were hijacked, including the Guardians. This must be "The Cradle\'s" doing.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "But we haven't found any hackers. I mean we haven't encountered anything except aggressive mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'As long as they are still hiding in this mountain, we will find them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Seems like they've not only kidnapped Kowloong civilians, but they're also collecting mechanoids for their own use.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'And if nothing is done about it... they could become a threat to Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Roger that. We will speed up our search for the hackers and the missing civilians.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The long blade in Pulao's hand is a standard weapon for Guardian I. It was designed to be durable and to withstand attacks from all sorts of enemies."}
{3: 'But this one is covered in rust and its edge is marred with numerous chips.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Has any of you rested since we got here yesterday?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "We haven'tâ€”not when it's our responsibility as Pulao Crew to protect Kowloong and its citizens...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "That won't do.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao puts the long sword next to the Guardian and, in a stern tone, starts speaking to Pulao Crew.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Humans have limits. How are we supposed to keep Kowloong safe if you all work yourselves into pulps?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "...We don't feel particularly tired, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You don't need to act tough when it's just us alone...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The head of the Pulao Crew is about to say something but swallows her words.'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "Understood. Let's get some rest, then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The dozen Pulao Crew lined up along the passage quickly scatters, each looking for a comfortable spot to get some rest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "I'll keep watch, my lady.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'll join you.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao leads her onto a tree branch hanging over the wooden passage and they sit down together.'}
{3: 'From here, they have a clear view of the narrow trail they took up the hill and the mountain ridges amid the hazy clouds nearby.'}
{3: 'Pulao gets out a piece of candy and hands it to the girl sitting beside her.'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Hum?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Just a little something to keep you going when you're tired.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: '...Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao Crew peels off the wrapper and tosses the lime-colored candy into her mouth.'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Wow, this is super sour!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Um-hum, it's a salted plum candy.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao unrolls one for herself and chucks it into her mouth.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Mmm... sour indeed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Do you always have candy with you when you go on missions?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Mm-hmm, it's just an old habit.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "But... you don't need to eat candy for energy now anymore, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I don't need to, but that doesn't mean I won't.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao stares into the clouds shrouding the towering mountains as she gently swings her legs.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You can't find a view like this on the Nighter.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Kowloong may well be the last place in the modern world that still offers such a sight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'I remember that when I was young, my father would tell me tales from lots of different places.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Some were of desolate mountains, some of glamorous, magnificent cities, and even railroads that span an entire continent...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "He must have been to a lot of places! I'm jealous...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'But in the end... he left the Nighter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'My father left the Nighter while I was still very young. He roamed the world as a Scavenger and I was raised by my mother.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'He only contacted us a few times in over a decade.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "No, don't be. He probably... doesn't even remember that he has a daughter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "As long as you still remember him, you'll see him again.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao flashes a bright smile and gives her companion a few pats on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I have always held onto the belief that one day, we will be reunited with the ones we hold dear.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "The fog thickens just as the candy in Pulao's mouth melts away and vanishes."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Did you manage to get some rest today?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'I took a quick nap around noon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Okay. I'll let you take over, then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Wake me up right away if anything comes up.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Copy that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No sooner has she lain down on the dead branch than the distant echo of a bell begins to resonate through the valley.'}
{3: 'Dong... dong... dong...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Alert, alert!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'This is the same sound we hear every time before the enemy attacks.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "C'mon, not even going to let us rest now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Pulao of Kowloong! Prepare to fight!', 4: '1'}
